desc: You wake up in your bed and remember nothing

1.desc: Your phone is locked. You don't know the password

2.desc: You use your computer that you left open

1.desc: You see that you live in Vancouver, Canada

2.desc: You see pictures of your some friends and family

3.desc: You check your email and see a threatening message - "We know what you're up to, you better stop right now or else"

1.desc: You Decide to type out a response, how do you respond to the email?
As you send the agressive response, you hear a loud banging on your door

1.gameover: A mafia member shoots you in the chest for responding rudely to his email

2.desc: You instantly get a response -"Don't play dumb with me, you know what i'm talkimg about. I saw your "work files" folder"
choices: Minimize email and look at work files folder

1.desc: You open the work files folder on the computer, you see two files
The password to the other file is 123 enter a puzzle here

2.desc: The file is locked, looks like you need a password

1.desc: The file reads "blah blah blah im a scientist and the antidote is in the drawer to the right"

2.gameover: You shut down your computer and now you don't know the password. Good move

3.gameover: You instantly get an email back "Not so tough now, are ya!" you die of lack of pride

2.gameover: Why would you delete the email?
